name: Autoworld Brussels
description: A beautiful museum with over 250 European and American classic cars.

name: Beaulieu National Motor Museum
description: Over 250 vehicles tell the story of motoring in Britain, from the earliest cars to F1.

name: Cité de l’Automobile
description: Home to the Schlumpf Collection, the world’s largest display of Bugatti cars.

name: Louwman Museum
description: Features one of the world’s oldest private car collections, from 1886 to today.

name: Mercedes-Benz Museum
description: A stunning museum dedicated to the history and innovation of Mercedes-Benz.

name: Museo Ferrari
description: Historic Ferrari museum with legendary cars and racing history.

name: National Corvette Museum
description: Dedicated to the Chevrolet Corvette, with rare models and interactive exhibits.

name: Petersen Automotive Museum
description: One of the world’s largest automotive museums, featuring classic, rare, and futuristic cars.

name: Porsche Museum
description: A modern museum dedicated to the history and innovation of Porsche.

name: Toyota Automobile Museum
description: Showcases the history of Toyota and the global automobile industry.
